description:
when you launch it, it will come up with a white box and it doesnt work with screensharing for some reason.

the old flatpak build worked fine but that has its own bugs aswell in gnome.

made sure i had the right depends installed but still didnt work properly
summary: comes up with a white box

description: i Installed the app recently and ran it. Bam it works on gnome without as much as a hiccup on disocrd. idk about other apps as i dont use them but it works like a charm.
Basically just launch it, open the application that you wanna stream and stream it. Such a time saver. Wish Discord would fix their stuff but this really helps.
when I launch it, it comes up with a white box and doesn't work with screensharing
The app opens with a white box, and doesn't appear to do anything when trying to stream on things like discord
Screensharing in Discord to the xwayland window provides no pop up, using the tray icon doesn't open any visible window and only gives the option to quit via a right click context menu.

Had the problem with the white box.
Got the newest build (go to gitlab > Build > Artifacts > flatpak > download), installed it and it now works!

Only the preview images of the windows do not seem to work correctly yet

Still, thank you!
summary: White Box Problem gone. Now works great!

description: Works really well and deals with the screen sharing problems in apps like Discord using Wayland.
